text: I feel like this was asked already but I can't find where. Do you have recommendations for a decent (not super expensive) ergonomic keyboard?

elements.text: I feel like this was asked already but I can't find where. Do you have recommendations for a decent (not super expensive) ergonomic keyboard?

text: I don't really have special requirements (doesn't need to be mechanical, esp. given that working at home I'd prefer something not super noisy), and I guess it doesn't have to have a numeric keypad (I don't remember ever using it).
